name: Storylines: Passion & Fashion
description:
In STORYLINES: PASSION & FASHION any romance story is possible. Explore beautiful full 3-D environments.

• Your choices affect the story and your relationships with characters (for real)
• Experience the most detailed character customization of any mobile story game
• Choose from hundreds of fashion options and create glamorous outfits
• Interact with fully animated characters
• Inclusive storytelling and LGBTQ+ romance options

FREE REWARDS
In-game rewards for playing!

SPICY STORIES
Our stories are about love, romance and major drama. At the center of all of it is... you.

NOT TO BRAG, BUT WE'RE REALLY GOOD LOOKING
Experience immersive cinematic 3-D graphics and expressive animation through captivating locations and encounters with characters. Did we mention you can make out with our characters...in the game, we mean?

YOUR CHOICES SERIOUSLY MATTER
How you interact with other characters will affect the entire story, not just the ending (but okay, also the ending). No two paths are the same and every choice can affect what happens next.

Get involved with the Storylines community!

https://www.instagram.com/storylinesgame/
https://www.twitter.com/StorylinesGame/
